roleset.name: to walk leisurely
roleset.note: AMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'amble' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from amble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: After long stretches of this attendant ground activity came 20 or so lovely minutes of [*] drifting above the Vosges [*-1]watching the silver mists rise off the river and the French cows amble about the fields .
